EmailTemplate.subject: PLEASE READ: New Commitment Based Product Feature
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Commitment Based Product The new Commitment Based Product is launching across SalesForce and SpaceStation on Oct 16th. Sales will be able to identify a suggested discounted pricing to new members in exchange for an occupancy commitment of either 6, 12, or 24 months. There are two places to locate these discount ranges on SalesForce: Reservable View and Building View.

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at salesforcesupport@wework.com
Sincerely, Susie
